wikipedia_page.main: Major General Rupert Timothy Herbert Jones,  (born 29 April 1969) is a senior British Army officer, who previously served as the Standing Joint Force Commander from November 2018 to July 2021. He will leave the Army in 2021.

response: The brigade was deployed to Afghanistan as part of Operation Herrick XVIII. It was deployed again in 2014, commanded by Brigadier Rupert Jones.
